Recycled paper bags - Instead of using plastic bags for shopping, we could switch to recycled paper bags which are biodegradable and eco-friendly.
Glass bottles - Instead of using plastic water bottles, we could switch to glass bottles which can be reused multiple times and are also recyclable.
Metal containers - Instead of using plastic food containers, we could switch to metal containers which are durable and can be easily cleaned.
Bamboo straws - Instead of using plastic straws, we could switch to bamboo straws which are biodegradable and reusable.
Hemp fabric - Instead of using synthetic fabrics, we could switch to hemp fabric which is sustainable and has a lower environmental impact than traditional cotton.
